name: DataCapturing
summary: Framework used to continuously capture data from all available sensors on an iOS device and transmit it to a Cyface-API compatible server.
description: This framework can be included by your App if you are going to capture sensor data and transmit that data to a Cyface-API server for further analysis.

script_phases.name: Set version and build
script_phases.script:
#!/bin/bash

# Determine plist path
plist=${BUILT_PRODUCTS_DIR}/${INFOPLIST_PATH}
# Determine current version
version=$(/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'Print CFBundleShortVersionString' "$plist")
# Get date of last commit
commitDate=$(date -r `git log -1 --date=short --pretty=format:%ct` +%Y%m%d)
# Get current date/time
buildDate=$(date +%Y%m%d%H%M)

# Set display version to existing version + commitDate
/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c "Set :CFBundleShortVersionString $version-$commitDate" "$plist"  # Version number

# Set build number to current date/time
/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c "Set :CFBundleVersion $buildDate" "$plist"  # Build number

echo "Version: $version-$commitDate"
echo "Build:   $buildDate"
